# IPL Platform Frontend - AI Coding Instructions

## Project Overview

Turborepo monorepo with 5 React applications (shell, lounge, portfolio, recordals, epv) and shared packages. All apps use React 19, Vite 7, TypeScript 5. Built for parallel development and shared code reuse.

## Architecture & Structure

**Apps**: Located in [apps/](apps/) directory. Each runs on unique port (3000-3004) with base path matching app name (`/shell/`, `/lounge/`, etc.). Package names follow `@ipl-platform-frontend/[app-name]` convention.

**Packages**: Empty structures in [packages/](packages/) for future shared code (ui, api-client, auth, i18n, types, utils, forms, table, eslint-config).

**Tooling**: Shared TypeScript configs in [tooling/tsconfig/](tooling/tsconfig/) - `base.json` (strict ESNext), `react.json` (extends base with JSX), `node.json` (extends base with Node types).

## Development Workflows

### Building & Running

```bash
pnpm install          # Install all dependencies
pnpm dev              # All apps in parallel
pnpm dev:shell        # Single app only
pnpm build            # Build all apps
pnpm type-check       # Type-check all apps
pnpm clean            # Clean everything
```

### Key Commands

- Apps created with `pnpm create vite` using `react-ts` template
- Each app has `dev`, `build`, `type-check`, `lint`, `clean` scripts
- Turborepo orchestrates parallel execution via [turbo.json](turbo.json)

### Testing

No test framework configured yet. When adding tests, update `turbo.json` pipeline and each app's `package.json`.

## Coding Conventions

### App Structure

Generated by Vite with standard React structure:
- [apps/\*/src/main.tsx](apps/shell/src/main.tsx) - Entry point with StrictMode
- [apps/\*/src/App.tsx](apps/shell/src/App.tsx) - Root component
- [apps/\*/vite.config.ts](apps/shell/vite.config.ts) - Vite config with port and base path

### Package Naming

- Apps: `@ipl-platform-frontend/[app-name]`
- Packages: `@ipl-platform-frontend/[package-name]`
- All packages are `private: true`

### Port Allocation

- Shell: 3000
- Lounge: 3001
- Portfolio: 3002
- Recordals: 3003
- EPV: 3004

## Integration Points

**Workspace**: pnpm workspaces defined in [pnpm-workspace.yaml](pnpm-workspace.yaml) covering `apps/*`, `packages/*`, `tooling/*`.

**Turborepo**: [turbo.json](turbo.json) configures task pipelines with caching for `build`, `type-check`, `lint`, `test`. `dev` task runs persistent without caching.

## Key Files & Directories

- [apps/](apps/) - 5 React applications created with `create-vite`
- [packages/](packages/) - Empty shared package structures
- [tooling/tsconfig/](tooling/tsconfig/) - Shared TypeScript configurations
- [turbo.json](turbo.json) - Turborepo task pipeline configuration
- [pnpm-workspace.yaml](pnpm-workspace.yaml) - Workspace package glob patterns

---
*Project initialized using official Vite scaffolding. Turborepo v2.x, pnpm v9.x, Node v22.x, React v19.x.*
